Body:
I want to send a file from a pc to another machine where owncloud is installed

import owncloud		oc = owncloud.Client('http://192.168.xx.xx/')		oc.login('username', 'password')		oc.mkdir('testdir')		oc.put_file('testdir/remotefile.txt', 'deno.txt',remote_user=True)		print('success')

The error is as follows:

Traceback (most recent call last): File cloud.py"
column29: port=80): Max retries	  exceeded with url: /ocs/v1.php/cloud/capabilities (Caused by	  NewConnectionError(': Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 111]	  Connection refused'

Body: Owncloud is running on the other side. What should be done to setup server??
Your server is not setup so the other side of a new connection is not ready to receive your request. Seems so in your traceback.
You are using 192.168.x.x so this address should be your server's IP. I don't know about owncloud but it must has something like `owncloud.Server` to run.
